name: df-oms
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(coms, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cpw(cuni(cdm(cv(s0)))), cinf(crn(cmpt(s2, crab(s3, cpw(cdm(cv(s0))), wa(wss(cv(s1), cuni(cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s3), cdom, com))), cesum(s4, cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s4))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt))))

comment: Define a function constructing an outer measure. See ~ omsval for its value. Definition 1.5 of [Bogachev] p. 16. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Sep-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Oct-2020.)
